author: Savar Shah
text:
Simple rules of happiness:

❤Believe in Mahadev
❤Love Mahadev
❤Trust Mahadev

🙏🔱Har Har Mahadev🔱🙏 https://t.co/9eycZT3C26

author: Savar Shah
text:
You are my
favourite addiction❤

#heshestories

author: Savar Shah
text:
When I look into your eyes, 
I know I have found the 
mirror of my soul

#LoveStories

author: Savar Shah
text:
A person you love is happiest 
when they know that you make 
them your everything...
In front of 
everyone
every time

author: Savar Shah
text:
Some of us care.
We always care.
That's our biggest problem

author: Savar Shah
text:
Being apart teaches 
us how to be together

author: Savar Shah
text:
The Old Ones
Are Still The Best...

Old jeans, old shoes, old friends, 
old cars, old tunes & old friends

author: Savar Shah
text:
Sweetest of relationships 
are like pillows...
When you are tired you 
relax on them.
When you are sad you drop 
tears on them.
When you are angry you 
punch them.
And when you are happy 
you hug them

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Even The
Nicest
People
Have
Their
Limits

author: Savar Shah
text:
People who fly into a rage 
always make a bad landing

~~Will Rogers

author: Savar Shah
text:
Love leaves a memory 
no one can steal

author: Savar Shah
text:
The most painful goodbye
is one that is not explained.

author: Savar Shah
text:
A Mom's hug lasts 
looong after she lets go🤗🤗

author: Savar Shah
text:
People who hate you are 
just confused admirers...

Because they can't figure out
the reason why everyone loves you.

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Relationship is a bond between persons
who may not be equal in qualification, 
talent, money, looks or age. 
But equal in their commitment
to understand each other.

author: Savar Shah
text:
Worrying is wasting energy on the things 
you can't control. Leave everything in 
Shiva's hand. Think less. Pray more🙏

🙏🔱Har Har Mahadev🔱🙏 https://t.co/vCAnCQo3uV

author: Savar Shah
text:
Beautiful are the souls 
that actually care for you

author: Savar Shah
text:
Love all
Trust few
Everything's real
but not everyone's true

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Life is too short to hide 
your feelings...
Don't be afraid to say 
what you feel

author: Savar Shah
text:
Mum: Do you love her?
Son: Yes
Mum: How do you know?
Son: Because nothing makes sense without her 

#LoveStories

author: Savar Shah
text:
Side by side or miles apart
dear friends are always close to the heart

author: Savar Shah
text:
Respect doesn't come with age...
You have to earn it by your behaviour 

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Be who you are.
Do what you love,
and go wherever your heart leads you.

Have a wonderful day😍😊🌹

author: Savar Shah
text:
If you can create stress, 
you can also create peace

author: Savar Shah
text:
Hope is such a small word
but it is filled with amazing potential

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Do your best
and Lord Shiva will do the rest❤

🙏🔱Har Har Mahadev🔱🙏 https://t.co/WmW8qWfl3N

author: Savar Shah
text:
Falling in love is very easy.
But staying in love is very special❤

author: Savar Shah
text:
Connection between 
two hearts💞is built on 
the pillars of Trust

author: Savar Shah
text:
One person with pure love
is enough for all your life

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Let's be thankful to those who
pray for us with or without 
our knowledge🙏

author: Savar Shah
text:
No Friends
   No Life

Know Friends
  Know Life🌹

author: Savar Shah
text:
The best things in life are 
mostly beyond your eyesight.

They're most often felt
from the heart.

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Mum plucked this beautiful hibiscus🌺
from the garden to put by her prayer place🙏 https://t.co/Pz6CO7K5hf

author: Savar Shah
text:
Feelings are connected 
heart to heart💞

Distance & time cannot
break them apart.

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
Some people are always important, 
with or without conversation 

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
True love doesn't just
fill your heart...
It overflows into your 
whole body & soul❤

#read

author: Savar Shah
text:
No amount of guilt can solve the past
and no amount of anxiety can change the future.

author: Savar Shah
text:
A relationship with Lord Shiva
is a true relationship❤

🙏🔱Har Har Mahadev🔱🙏 https://t.co/950Mqe7ahI

author: Savar Shah
text:
Love didn't hurt you.

Someone who doesn't 
know how to love hurt you.

Don't confuse the two.

author: Savar Shah
text:
Your flaws are perfect 
for the heart that is
meant to love you

author: Savar Shah
text:
Don't let someone change 
who you are to become
what they need

author: Savar Shah
text:
You will forever own 
a piece of me, 
that I can never 
take back 

#HeSheStories

author: Savar Shah
text:
Sweet candies are nice to eat.
Sweet words are easy to say.
But sweet people are hard to find

author: Savar Shah
text:
When it comes to relationships, 
less control, more freedom.
It's all about trust.
If there's no trust, 
there's no magnetic connection

author: Savar Shah
text:
Love is like learning to play music🎶
First you must learn to play by the rules, 
then you must forget the rules & play from your heart❤

author: Savar Shah
text:
Love is not just feelings
of passion & romance...

author: Savar Shah
text:
Things left unsaid, 
stay with you forever

author: Savar Shah
text:
A true friend accepts who you are, 
but also helps you become
who you should be

author: Savar Shah
text:
It is beautiful to express love
and even more beautiful to feel it

author: Savar Shah
text:
Don't think for a second that you are alone.
Mahadev is always with you❤🙏

🙏🔱Har Har Mahadev🔱🙏 https://t.co/UgymCHQjQV
